text: Pete Kelly's Blues can refer to: * Pete Kelly's Blues (radio series) ** Pete Kelly's Blues (film), 1955 film based on the radio series *** Songs from Pete Kelly's Blues, soundtrack album of the 1955 film *** "Pete Kelly's Blues" (song), 1955 song introduced in the movie ** Pete Kelly's Blues (TV series), 1959 television series also based on the radio series == See also == * Peter Kelly (disambiguation)
title: Pete Kelly's Blues
